content: materials used bernat softee cotton or any #3 weight yarn in sandstone s = 3 skeins m and l = 4 skeins xl and 2xl = 5 skeins 3xl = 6 skeins size h/8 5 00 mm crochet hook tapestry needle for weaving in ends sizes fits bust measurement s = 32″-34″ m = 36″-38″ l = 40″-42″ xl = 44″-46″ 2x = 48″-50″ 3x = 52″-54 one finished panel laid out flat measures approximately s = 18″ wide x 19 5″ long m = 20″ wide x 19 5″ long l = 22″ wide x 20″ long xl = 24″ wide x 21″ long 2x = 26″ wide x 22 5″ long 3x = 28″ wide x 22 5″ long gauge 4″ x 4″ = 14 half_double_crochet 11 row the body of this elegant sweater is made using only half double crochets with every other row consisting of alternating front and back loop half double crochets to provide some interesting texture i used a #3 weight cotton yarn to keep things lightweight and airy this sleeveless crochet sweater is finished off with a comfy loosely draped cowl neck
